member.name: ID3D10EffectStringVariable.GetString
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectStringVariable.GetStringArray
member.param: A pointer to the first string in the array.
The offset (in number of strings) between the start of the array and the first string to get.
The number of strings in the returned array.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectStringVariable
member.summary: A string-variable interface accesses a string variable.
